verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And about the ninth hour Jesus cried out with a loud voice, saying, “Eli, Eli, lama sabachthani?” that is to say, “My God, My God, why hast Thou forsaken Me?”
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Some of those who stood there, when they heard that, said, “This man calleth for Elijah.”
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And straightway one of them ran and took a sponge, and filled it with vinegar, and put it on a reed and gave Him to drink.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: The rest said, “Let be; let us see whether Elijah will come to save him.”
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Jesus, when He had cried out again with a loud voice, yielded up the ghost.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And behold, the veil of the temple was rent in two from the top to the bottom, and the earth quaked and the rocks rent.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the graves were opened; and many bodies of the saints who slept arose,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and came out of the graves after His resurrection, and went into the Holy City and appeared unto many.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now when the centurion, and those who were with him watching Jesus, saw the earthquake and those things that were done, they feared greatly, saying, “Truly, this was the Son of God!”
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And many women were there beholding afar off, who followed Jesus from Galilee, ministering unto Him,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: among whom were Mary Magdalene, and Mary the mother of James and Joseph, and the mother of Zebedee’s children.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: When the evening had come, there came a rich man of Arimathea named Joseph, who himself also was Jesus’ disciple.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: He went to Pilate, and begged the body of Jesus. Then Pilate commanded the body to be delivered.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when Joseph had taken the body, he wrapped it in a clean linen cloth
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: and laid it in his own new tomb, which he had hewn out in the rock. And he rolled a great stone to the door of the sepulcher and departed.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Mary Magdalene was there, and the other Mary, sitting opposite the sepulcher.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now the next day, that following the Day of the Preparation, the chief priests and Pharisees came together unto Pilate,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: saying, “Sir, we remember that that deceiver said while he was yet alive, ‘After three days I will rise again.’
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Command therefore that the sepulcher be made secure until the third day, lest his disciples come by night and steal him away, and say unto the people, ‘He is risen from the dead,’ so that the last error shall be worse than the first.”
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Pilate said unto them, “Ye have a watch. Go your way, make it as secure as ye can.”
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So they went and made the sepulcher secure, sealing the stone and setting up a watch.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: At the end of the Sabbath, as it began to dawn toward the first day of the week, came Mary Magdalene and the other Mary to see the sepulcher.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And behold, there was a great earthquake, for the angel of the Lord descended from Heaven, and came and rolled back the stone from the door, and sat upon it.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: His countenance was like lightning, and his raiment white as snow.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And for fear of him the guards shook and became as dead men.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And the angel answered and said unto the women, “Fear ye not, for I know that ye seek Jesus, who was crucified.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: He is not here, for He is risen, as He said. Come, see the place where the Lord lay.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And go quickly and tell His disciples that He is risen from the dead, and behold, He goeth before you into Galilee. There shall ye see Him. Lo, I have told you.”
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And they departed quickly from the sepulcher with fear and great joy, and ran to bring His disciples word.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And as they went to tell His disciples, behold, Jesus met them, saying, “All hail.” And they came, and held Him by the feet, and worshiped Him.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then said Jesus unto them, “Be not afraid. Go tell My brethren to go into Galilee, and there shall they see Me.”
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Now when they were going, behold, some of the guards came into the city and reported unto the chief priests all the things that were done.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when they were assembled with the elders and had taken counsel, they gave a large sum of money unto the soldiers,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: saying, “Say ye, ‘His disciples came by night and stole him away while we slept.’
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And if this come to the governor’s ears, we will persuade him and secure you.”
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: So they took the money, and did as they were taught; and this account is commonly reported among the Jews until this day.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Then the eleven disciples went away into Galilee onto a mountain where Jesus had appointed them.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And when they saw Him, they worshiped Him; but some doubted.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: And Jesus came and spoke unto them, saying, “All power is given unto Me in Heaven and on earth.
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: Go ye therefore and teach all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost,
verses.speaker: Narrator

verses.text: teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you. And lo, I am with you always, even unto the end of the world.” Amen.
verses.speaker: Narrator
